title: Bi-Weekly Gaming Discussion Thread
selftext:
What are you playing, r/India? Let us use this thread to discuss any games you're playing, have played or are going to play. (Mobile and board games included!)

What game are you looking forward to? Are you a developer? Show us your wares!

Please don't just list the names of games, make sure to write a word or two about them as well.

Check out r/IndianGaming! They are an active community and also host a few co-op sessions.

**Gaming Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Gaming+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/xagdqefyv8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=f975f1c3093a3d9598a1da39854b03d1250bd55d
comments: Borderlands 2 is one of the best games I've ever played.

Currently reading-playing Star Wars: Jedi Survivor on New Game+. Glitches aside, this has been my most favourite Star Wars experience ever. A good palette cleanser after the diarrhoea that the new shows and movies have been.
Waiting for Riot MMO for the next 8 years. Just waiting...
Waiting for riot mmo, and not play anything until then, however long it takes. Becoming healthy and stockpiling food so i can die on the chair playing it, the greatest game of all time

Still playing ToTK. I got stuck in making increasingly stupid & impractical builds & didn’t realize how many days passed by. On that one, finding shrines is easier if you traverse through the nether world & mark them all ‘cause maps are mirrors.

Also playing Magic Reawakened but it’s my first card game and I’m so frustrated. If any of y’all playing please join our club. It’s number 2 in India and we need good players.
Playing Dark Souls 2 Scholar of the First Sin. Has a different vibe to Dark Souls 1 but I am liking it a lot. Currently exploring Huntsman's Copse.
